ISSUE.TITLE: Unexpected behaviour with Cmd+C keybinding on post page
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Summary When trying to copy text from an article using the Cmd+C key combination, the scroll goes straight to the comments section. When your blog provides code snippets that are frequently copied, this is really bad behaviour ### Steps to Reproduce If it makes difference, the Journal theme activated 1. Visit any post page 2.
